body:
Comment 1: 
I believe libcgo is not yet running on arm.
To build just the parts that work on arm,
try running ./all-arm.bash instead of ./all.bash.

We'll be interested to know how well the floating
point tests work.  The port is not quite 100% in that
category yet.
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Done**._
